name: Wake Up (itch) (dakinand)
description:
___________________________________________________________________________

Wake Up is a tiny dream world featuring:

  • No NPCs
  • No quests
  • No skill trees
  • No collectibles
  • No endings
  • 2.5D graphics

___________________________________________________________________________

Created using:

  • Townscaper for modelling
  • Bitsy game maker with Bitsy Savior
  • RGBitsy and RGBsplice tools
  • Transparent Sprites, Permanent Items, and Avatar by Room hacks
